name: JUMANJI RUN
description:
JUMANJI, THE CURSED BOARD GAME HAS RETURNED AS A RUNNER !  

Go Back to the Jungle and and try to escape !

Be prepared to face your fears and the many traps hidden in the jungles in this ultimate challenge. Collect your gears, grab your abilities and get through the dangerous environment.

 Will you complete all the levels and earn your right to go back to our world ?

 

*Insert Jumanji drums* Play now by downloading the game just below !

 

Team Members : 

- Laura Mas Maury

- Aurore Bury

- Arthur Favre
